FuncDef:
The display port-observing observe-index command displays the configuration of the observing port with a specified observe index.
The display port-observing slot command displays an observing port on an interface board in a specified slot.

ParaDef.Info:
Index of an observing port.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Specifies the slot number of the interface board in position.
-

Examples: Interface                  L-Header Obs-index Status Description  Dest-MAC
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you configure an observing port, run display port-observing observe-index command to view the configuration of this observing port.
To view the observing port on the interface board in a specified slot, run the display port-observing slot command. If slot-id is not specified, observing ports and their reference slot numbers of all interface board slots will be displayed.
